title: Trilli7777
author: Trilli7777
created_time: October 31, 2024, 05:03:20 PMLast edit: November 01, 2024, 08:45:30 PM by Trilli7777
content: On 31st October 2008, Satoshi Nakamoto officially introduced Bitcoin White paper  to the general public as a peer to peer electronic cash system This crypto currency has come a long way from being a digital experiment to now becoming a global sensationAlthough it wasn't easy but she fought her way through all trials and tribulations and against all odds Bitcoin is now the number one cryptocurrency and has reached a market value of over $1.4 million making it the 10th largest global asset and can be regarded as the new digital goldIt is well known to be the best currency for financial freedom Well, all these won't have been possible without the great Satoshi Nakamoto I'm happy I purchased my first Bitcoin, and I'm proud to call myself a bitcoiner

comments.author: SatoPrincess
comments.body: Quote from: Trilli7777 on October 31, 2024, 05:03:20 PMI'm happy I purchased my first Bitcoin, and I'm proud to call myself a bitcoinerAll this to say you just purchased your first Bitcoin. You must be very excited about purchasing your first bitcoin, Congratulations OP. From the essay you wrote I trust that you fully understand what you’re investing in. Hopefully you didn’t break the bank on this purchase. Read more on threads that discuss types of wallet, how to secure one’s seed phrase. If you bought a significant amount of bitcoin, you should consider buying a hardware wallet.

comments.author: Josefjix
comments.body: Congratulations on owing your first bitcoin sats and I am curious to know did you buy a whole unit of bitcoin or just a fraction of bits, and also hope you did not buy your bitcoin when the price of bitcoin was high some hours ago, let say when the price was above 70,000 region, because if you did, then you have to bear the short term correction and dropped in price.Be ready to wait for a long time and only put the money you may not be needing for a long time into bitcoin, don't buy Bitcoin with money that you have urgent need to use, because doing so will put you under pressure to see the price recover at each time.

comments.author: kotajikikox
comments.body: Quote from: Trilli7777 on October 31, 2024, 05:03:20 PMWell, all these won't have been possible without the great Satoshi Nakamoto I'm happy I purchased my first Bitcoin, and I'm proud to call myself a bitcoinerCongratulations, mate.It doesn’t matter if you purchased your bitcoin a decade ago or just today, it deserves to be celebrated still. Of course profit-wise, we all wish we could have bought bitcoin from when it was first released but alas we already are living in the present and no need in thinking about what if’s. What we should do is to think about now how to maximize the bitcoin we hold.Especially now that we are approaching what seems to be the peak of the current bull run and everyone’s attention is toward bitcoin at the moment.

comments.author: MusaMohamed
comments.body: Quote from: Trilli7777 on October 31, 2024, 05:03:20 PMI'm happy I purchased my first Bitcoin, and I'm proud to call myself a bitcoinerYou will need more time to become an actual Bitcoiner who needs to understand power of HODL and have diamond hands for hodling in one full market cycle or better through several market cycles.Many people can join Bitcoin market with their purchases but they don't stay here for too long. After several market downs, corrections, bull market drawbacks, crashes in a bear market, they easily panic sell to have loss and fearfully leave the market forever. Some of them will call Bitcoin is a fraud, and if you won't be short-lasting Bitcoin holder like them, you will gradually become an actual Bitcoiner.

comments.author: pooya87
comments.body: Quote from: Trilli7777 on October 31, 2024, 05:03:20 PMas a pair to pair electronic cash system The correct term is "peer to peer".Quoteagainst all odds Bitcoin is now the number one cryptocurrencyBitcoin has always been number one cryptocurrency since there has been no other. The altcoins are mostly jokes and useless and to this day nothing has even come close to Bitcoin's usage.QuoteI'm happy I purchased my first Bitcoin, and I'm proud to call myself a bitcoinerCongratulations, but keep in mind that bitcoin is not just some asset that is bought for profit. It is money, the only money in existence (everything else including fiat is currency). As money it should also be used as a medium of exchange which means you should try to pay for stuff with your bitcoins and most importantly be paid in bitcoin if you can (as opposed to just buying it with fiat).

comments.author: krishnaverma
comments.body: Quote from: Trilli7777 on October 31, 2024, 05:03:20 PMI'm happy I purchased my first Bitcoin, and I'm proud to call myself a bitcoinerWhen did you purchase this first bitcoin ? If it was 2010 or before, you are one of the investors whose life got changed because of bitcoin investment. Even if you invested recently, there is nothing lost. If you hold for next 10 years, you can expect 10 times returns in the next 10 years. You should also inform your friends about bitcoin, now that it is 16 years old, more new users will trust it and try investing some amount in it.

comments.author: Dr.Bitcoin_Strange
comments.body: If only some person knew what the future of Bitcoin would have turned out to become, then they would have purchased or mined a lot of it by then. When Bitcoin first started, mining it was very easy and the reward was high and as of that time, I head that there was faucet and some airdrops that you can earn quite a lot of Bitcoin from but today, Bitcoin has become a very preferred asset by millions of people from all over the world.

comments.body: Quote from: krishnaverma on November 01, 2024, 04:12:55 AMQuote from: Trilli7777 on October 31, 2024, 05:03:20 PMI'm happy I purchased my first Bitcoin, and I'm proud to call myself a bitcoinerWhen did you purchase this first bitcoin ? If you hold for next 10 years, you can expect 10 times returns in the next 10 years. You should also inform your friends about bitcoin, now that it is 16 years old, more new users will trust it and try investing some amount in it.  there's no indication to suggest that OP is part of the earlier Bitcoin investor. OP created his account on the forum this year and isn't yet all too knowledgeable on Bitcoin so it's unlikely that he's been an active investor prio to this year. Again, holding Bitcoin for the next 10 years doesn't guarantee 10X returns and for that to even happen, it means that Bitcoin must have gotten to $700k which is a figure I wouldn't outrightly assume is too easy to get to.Bitcoin is still profitable and has a lot of benefit in holding it with potential returns that's still good but it's still good not to be too ambitious on what we expect from it. For those that knows it worth, it's an asset that's worth holding and even if you're not fortunate to be part of those that have been involved in it for even up to 5 or 10 years, the few moments spent in the Bitcoin ecosystem is always fieled with a lot of positives.

comments.author: Darker45
comments.body: Congratulations! Firsts usually give you the best kind of feelings. Is it first Bitcoin? Not just first purchase? Or first Satoshis? Anyway, it's peer to peer. Calling it pair to pair makes the impression that perhaps you are too early to call yourself a Bitcoiner. It's in the title itself of Bitcoin's whitepaper. Have you read it?Also, it's not $1.4 million. That's the market cap of an unknown shitcoin. Bitcoin's isn't in the million, not even in the billion, Bitcoin's is in the trillion.

comments.author: BlackHatCoiner
comments.body: Bitcoin as concept became 16, and the blockchain will be running for 16 years by January.It's incredible how Bitcoin is just 16 while the problem it solves is as old as human himself; transferring value through time and space. Until 2009, gold was the only true form of money, yet even it had lost some of its resistance to inflation as advances in technology made it easier to extract.We don't appreciate enough how lucky generation we are.

comments.author: Majestic-milf
comments.body: Bitcoin managed to beat all odds, criticisms and prophecies of it not being able to last long when it was introduced in 2008 and is still pushing strong 16 years later. Congratulations Op on your purchase of Bitcoin; even though we can't decipher if you're trying to say you made your first purchase this year or earlier on but I guess the important thing is that people are tapping into the invention of Satoshi. One thing is sure; no matter how much rules and regulations or laws a government would try to press on Bitcoin to somehow kill it's existence, the digital coin would always find a way to survive.
